artifactHints.Artifact of Elder: &push;&main-color=#c300ff;Artifact of Elder&pop; has no need to be located.
artifactHints.Artifact of Wild: &push;&main-color=#c300ff;Artifact of Wild&pop; has no need to be located.

artifactHints.Artifact of Chozo: &push;&main-color=#c300ff;Artifact of Chozo&pop; has no need to be located.
artifactHints.Artifact of Nature: &push;&main-color=#c300ff;Artifact of Nature&pop; has no need to be located.
artifactHints.Artifact of Sun: &push;&main-color=#c300ff;Artifact of Sun&pop; has no need to be located.
artifactHints.Artifact of World: &push;&main-color=#c300ff;Artifact of World&pop; has no need to be located.
artifactHints.Artifact of Spirit: &push;&main-color=#c300ff;Artifact of Spirit&pop; has no need to be located.
artifactHints.Artifact of Newborn: &push;&main-color=#c300ff;Artifact of Newborn&pop; has no need to be located.
artifactHints.Artifact of Truth: &push;&main-color=#c300ff;Artifact of Truth&pop; is located in &push;&main-color=#89a1ff;Phazon Mines - Processing Center Access&pop;.
artifactHints.Artifact of Strength: &push;&main-color=#c300ff;Artifact of Strength&pop; is located in &push;&main-color=#89a1ff;Tallon Overworld - Root Cave&pop;.

transports.Phendrana Drifts South (Quarantine Cave): Magmoor Caverns South (Magmoor Workstation, Save Station)

transports.Tallon Overworld East (Frigate Crash Sit: Chozo Ruins East (Reflecting Pool, Save Station)

3671417093:
&main-color=#89D6FF;It is possible to stand on Stone Toads.


By slope jumping off of the spine on its back, one can reach the top of Reflecting Pool without draining the water.
2124053457:
&main-color=#89D6FF;One can reach the top with the &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF; by jumping on the pointed root protruding from the wall. 
 The name "Mr. Peg" is etched into the root.
3745923772:
&main-color=#89D6FF;It is possible to stand on Sheegoths.


By jumping off of them with &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF;, one can climb Ice Ruins East without missiles.
3162940989:
&main-color=#89D6FF;It is possible to stand on Baby Sheegoths.


By jumping off of them with &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF;, one can climb Ice Ruins East without missiles.
3508298443:
&main-color=#89D6FF;Using a double bomb jump, one can roll on top of a Bloodflower.

By using another double bomb jump on top of it, Great Tree Chamber is reachable from Great Tree Hall without Space Jump Boots.
2541494929:
&main-color=#89D6FF;One can reach the ledge leading to Vault with &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF;.

It requires holding &image=SA,3.0,1.0,1.0,46434ED3,34E79314; while jumping from a brick platform under a twisting tree.
2903166635: &main-color=#89D6FF;When Metroid Prime's exoskeleton is weak to the Power Beam, it can also be damaged by the &main-color=#FF3333;Flamethrower&main-color=#89D6FF;.
2271263048: &main-color=#89D6FF;To cross the bridge without fighting Hive Mecha, carefully walk along its right edge.
2053272936: &main-color=#89D6FF;When using the &main-color=#FF3333;Boost Ball&main-color=#89D6FF; in a half pipe, hold only &image=8B0C22A7; or &image=778CCD6A; and boost at the lowest point to gain the most height.
399696251: &main-color=#89D6FF;When using the &main-color=#FF3333;Boost Ball&main-color=#89D6FF;, if the control stick is kept in a neutral position, the Boost Ball has no speed limit.
4175379874: &main-color=#89D6FF;Flaahgra can be defeated with the &main-color=#FF3333;Wavebuster&main-color=#89D6FF;. On Normal difficulty, doing so without any other sources of damage requires 230 missiles.
889553182:
&main-color=#89D6FF;Jumping on the center of a frozen Metroid causes one to bounce on top of it.

When it breaks out of the ice, anyone on top is launched high in the air

This can be used to traverse Metroid Quarantine A without Space Jump Boots, Morph Ball Bombs, or Spider Ball.
4176439895:
&main-color=#89D6FF;Jumping on the center of a frozen Hunter Metroid causes one to bounce on top of it.

When it breaks out of the ice, anyone on top is launched high in the air.

This can be used to acquire Frost Cave's item without the Grapple Beam.
425486343: &main-color=#89D6FF;It is possible to surmount the gate at the top of this room with a carefully-timed double bomb jump.
1102487982: &main-color=#89D6FF;It is possible to climb up to this room's top door from the bottom. There are multiple methods, the easiest of which only needs the &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF; to climb the crashed frigate's exterior.
3737672425: &main-color=#89D6FF;By jumping along the rectangular extrusions on this building's exterior, it is possible to reach the roof without Space Jump Boots.
3893588753: &main-color=#89D6FF;While on this building's roof, it is possible to reach Warrior Shrine without lowering the bridge. To do so, stand on top of the roof computer's tallest monitor, lock onto a Puffer to the right or left, and perform a lock-on dash towards the ledge.
1839087853:
&main-color=#89D6FF;Opening the tree requires a &main-color=#FF3333;Super Missile&main-color=#89D6FF;.


Additionally, it is possible to peek the item inside the tree without opening it. To do so, stand at a specific angle and location on the right side of the tree's lip, then jump in place.
1530752134: &main-color=#89D6FF;The item in this room can be acquired without the Scan Visor by using the &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF; and L-Jumping.
3740523398: &main-color=#89D6FF;As long as the boxes in this room remain intact, they can be climbed to exit this room without any items.
442524052: &main-color=#89D6FF;Hold&image=5D9F9796;and rapidly tap &image=EA2A1C5C; to fire missiles as fast as possible.
807982837:
&main-color=#89D6FF;Underwater slope jumps performed without the Gravity Suit allow access to great heights.

You can use an underwater slope jump to reach the sunken item in this room without the Gravity Suit. This is significantly easier with the &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF;.
2077227745: &main-color=#89D6FF;During the first phase of combat against Meta Ridley, hitting it with a &main-color=#FF3333;Boost Ball&main-color=#89D6FF; charge causes enough damage to immediately move to the fight's second phase.
2967215000:
&main-color=#89D6FF;Everything south of Twin Fires Tunnel in Magmoor Caverns is not superheated,

allowing for safe travel without the Varia Suit.
1735564172:
&main-color=#89D6FF;The &main-color=#FF3333;Sandstone&main-color=#89D6FF; structures in this room are some of the few that cannot be destroyed by Power Bombs.
Note that some game versions change that.
1618265307: &main-color=#89D6FF;Like most &main-color=#FF3333;Sandstone&main-color=#89D6FF; structures, this can also be destroyed by &main-color=#FF3333;Power Bombs&main-color=#89D6FF;.
745991660: &main-color=#89D6FF;Like most &main-color=#FF3333;Talloric Alloy&main-color=#89D6FF; structures, the grate above can also be destroyed by &main-color=#FF3333;Power Bombs&main-color=#89D6FF;.
3344095433: &main-color=#89D6FF;Like most &main-color=#FF3333;Sandstone&main-color=#89D6FF; structures, this can also be destroyed by &main-color=#FF3333;Power Bombs&main-color=#89D6FF;.
3485565452:
&main-color=#89D6FF;These Bomb Slot covers are able to be destroyed by &main-color=#FF3333;Power Bombs&main-color=#89D6FF;.

Additionally, these Bomb Slots are also able to be activated by Power Bombs.
1354393071: &main-color=#89D6FF;Like most &main-color=#FF3333;Sandstone&main-color=#89D6FF; structures, this can also be destroyed by &main-color=#FF3333;Power Bombs&main-color=#89D6FF;.
3507547160:
&main-color=#89D6FF;Like most &main-color=#FF3333;Sandstone&main-color=#89D6FF; structures, this can also be destroyed by &main-color=#FF3333;Power Bombs&main-color=#89D6FF;.

Additionally, in most game versions, these rocks will not reappear after being destroyed.
3269646811: &main-color=#89D6FF;Like most &main-color=#FF3333;Talloric Alloy&main-color=#89D6FF; structures, this can also be destroyed by &main-color=#FF3333;Power Bombs&main-color=#89D6FF;.
1876916293: &main-color=#89D6FF;The item within Fungal Hall B's mushroom ring can be uncovered with &main-color=#FF3333;Morph Ball Bombs&main-color=#89D6FF; or &main-color=#FF3333;Power Bombs&main-color=#89D6FF;.
4186358462:
&main-color=#89D6FF;This &main-color=#FF3333;Bendezium&main-color=#89D6FF; surface has a note:


 Life Grove and Life Grove Tunnel each contain a &main-color=#FF3333;Sandstone&main-color=#89D6FF; structure.

Like most &main-color=#FF3333;Sandstone&main-color=#89D6FF; structures, they can also be destroyed by &main-color=#FF3333;Power Bombs&main-color=#89D6FF;.
323204925: &main-color=#89D6FF;In addition to missiles, the weak wall section in this room is able to be destoyed by the &main-color=#FF3333;Charge Beam&main-color=#89D6FF;.
56434148: &main-color=#89D6FF;Fighting the Cloaked Drone locks all doors except the door to Quarantine Access A.
3355561537: &main-color=#89D6FF;A corner of this room can be used to acquire &main-color=#FF3333;Infinite Speed&main-color=#89D6FF;. Using Infinite Speed before defeating the Cloaked Drone results in taking significantly less damage.
1755484832: &main-color=#89D6FF;When the Cloaked Drone is defeated, it is possible to leave the room without collecting the item.
2271012115: &main-color=#89D6FF;In lieu of Morph Ball Bombs, one can also exit Spinners with &main-color=#FF3333;Power Bombs&main-color=#89D6FF;.
263442559:
&main-color=#89D6FF;If coming from Sun Tower Access, Flaahgra can be defeated without shooting the first mirror.
Scan dashing or &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF; allows one to reach the center and bomb the bomb slots.
345113941: &main-color=#89D6FF;In addition to a missile, a &main-color=#FF3333;Power Bomb&main-color=#89D6FF; or &main-color=#FF3333;Plasma Beam&main-color=#89D6FF; shot will break the Metroid's tank.
437035956:
&main-color=#89D6FF;If entering from Reflecting Pool Access before the Chozo Ghosts have been awakened,

one can move through the room along a specific path while avoiding awakening the ghosts.
This can either be used to activate the Bomb Slots or to reach Crossway Access South.
213585783:
&main-color=#89D6FF;The nearby item is acquirable without Morph Ball Bombs by unmorphing on the crane platform's edge.
Alternatively, one can slope jump off of this cabin's roof to scale the crane platform and reach the item.
130269422: &main-color=#89D6FF;It is possible to reach the door to Waste Disposal with a scan dash and &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF;.
3474604570: &main-color=#89D6FF;The Space Pirates in this room are alerted when one steps in front of the entrance to West Tower. One can avoid this by jumping around the space directly in front of the entrance.
3573990646: &main-color=#89D6FF;One can cross Quarantine Cave without fighting Thardus by using aerial movement around the room's edges.
3820360882: &main-color=#89D6FF;When entering from Sun Tower Access, one can awaken the Chozo Ghosts in Sunchamber without falling to the bottom of the room. This requires either using the &main-color=#FF3333;Spider Ball&main-color=#89D6FF; to roll to the bottom of the magnetic track before rolling back up, or stopping the descent with an Oculus and using complex bomb jumps to rise back to the top.
1530945290: &main-color=#89D6FF;In Training Chamber, one can avoid awakening the Chozo Ghosts by climbing architecture near the entrance to Training Chamber Access.
3721670052:
&main-color=#89D6FF;There are several ways to cross Magma Pool without the Grapple Beam.

The simplest uses the &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF; and &main-color=#FF3333;Gravity Suit&main-color=#89D6FF; to jump off of a raised stone in the lava near the far ledge.
A similar method uses a double bomb jump from the same location, though it requires not having the Gravity Suit.
A harder method uses &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF; to scan-dash off of pickups left by the crates.

Finally, it is possible to get across with &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF; by L-jumping between the lips of the leftmost pillars.
This is more difficult than it appears, as the closest pillar is not standable.
455264308: &main-color=#89D6FF;Taking damage will interrupt use of the Spider Ball or Grapple Beam. This includes damage from superheated rooms.
2410883438: &main-color=#89D6FF;Holding &image=SA,3.0,1.0,1.0,46434ED3,34E79314; grants greater control over aerial movement, making precise jumps easier.
389886815: &main-color=#89D6FF;When performing a scan dash or lock-on dash, jump by tapping &image=SI,0.70,0.68,833BEE04; for as little time as possible to gain extra height.
3668253850:
&main-color=#89D6FF;Each room has different pickups that drop from crates and defeated enemies.

If a specific pickup does not seem to be appearing (e.g. Power Bomb ammo), try a different room.
3673769160:
&main-color=#89D6FF;Holding &image=SA,3.0,1.0,1.0,46434ED3,34E79314; for the first 13 frames of a jump and then letting go
slightly extends jumps. This is called an L-Jump. When using the &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF;, holding &image=SA,3.0,1.0,1.0,46434ED3,34E79314; for 7 frames after the second jump grants an additional, smaller extension.
1807281950: &main-color=#89D6FF;Each game in Randovania has a Frequently Asked Questions section.
3979124144:
&main-color=#89D6FF;By default, seeds in Randovania generate with spoiler logs.

Spoiler logs can be used to check what items are at specific locations, among other information.
2367804388:
&main-color=#89D6FF;There is a 1/1024 chance for Missile Expansions to be &main-color=#FF3333;shiny&main-color=#89D6FF;.


Shiny Missile Expansions are &main-color=#3333FF;blue&main-color=#89D6FF;.



That is all.
4213747411: &main-color=#89D6FF;While unmorphed, there is no sideways limit to your speed.
3234096437: &main-color=#89D6FF;Those seeking guidance can find community at &main-color=#3333FF;discord.gg/mprando&main-color=#89D6FF;.
577744447:
&main-color=#89D6FF;Every video in Randovania's Metroid Prime database can be found at &main-color=#3333FF;randovania.org/
games/prime1/videos&main-color=#89D6FF;.
4140247203: &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF; raise the maximum vertical speed at which one can travel.
1363007955:
As long as one knows where to stand, the X-Ray Visor is not needed for traveling along invisible platforms. 
 Rapidly firing the &main-color=#FF3333;Power Beam&main-color=#89D6FF; and watching where its shots land can help reveal the shape of invisible platforms.
7691327: Nothing requires the Thermal Visor to function. If one knows where to shoot, manual aim can suffice.
1304296756:
All power conduits are protected by identical grates.


One can study the grate near this room's top entrance to know how to spot power conduits in other rooms.
197241462: Sometimes, moving forward without considering an exit path can result in getting stuck. For example, entering this pit without access to the &main-color=#FF3333;Morph Ball&main-color=#89D6FF; or &main-color=#FF3333;Space Jump Boots&main-color=#89D6FF; will result in no means of escape. However, clever usage of the environment and movement tricks can often create opportunities for escape.
1430090441: &main-color=#89D6FF;When playing multiworld games in Randovania, one does not need to have the multiworld browser navigated to the related session. So long as Randovania itself is open and connected to the game, items will be sent and received properly.
2465682118: &main-color=#89D6FF;There is a &main-color=#FF3333;secret tunnel&main-color=#89D6FF; in Crossway Access South.
